Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Book>

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Book>
    A Book has basic information about itself and how to compare it self with other books.
